text: Crout is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Alfred Crout Harmer (1825–1900), American politician, a Republican member of the United States House of Representatives from Pennsylvania *Henry Crout (fl. 1612–1617), English settler, explorer *John Crout (1899-1987), American engineer *Prescott Durand Crout (1907–1984), American mathematician ==See also== *Crout matrix decomposition, a matrix decomposition
title: Crout
